:wave: Hey! Thanks for pointing this issue out, I've found the root cause of the issue and I'm working on the fix right now.
I'll let you know when the fix is live :smile:
The fix should be live! Let me know if you run into any more issues
Quick question on the Themes Hackathon submissions. I would assume that the theme needs to be approved in the marketplace before we submit all the info to the actual challenge correct?
